Subskills.name: Overheating Engine
Subskills.description: Increases the spinning speed of rogue chainsaws.

Subskills.name: Ripping Impact
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict bleeding on hit.

Subskills.name: Slice Em Up
Subskills.description: Chainsaws now slowly travel forward with increased size and damage.

Subskills.name: Handling Skills
Subskills.description: Increases the cast rate of rogue chainsaw while wielding a chainsaw.

Subskills.name: Rough Chains
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by rogue chainsaw.

Subskills.name: Engine Gone Wild
Subskills.description: When expiring, the chainsaws launch into the direction they are facing, dealing additional damage and bouncing off of terrain.

Subskills.name: Chaining Chainsaws
Subskills.description: Launched chainsaws have a chance to chain when they first hit an enemy.

Subskills.name: Empty The Workbag
Subskills.description: Chance on cast to throw additional rogue chainsaw.

Subskills.name: Circle of Cutting
Subskills.description: Throw multiple rogue chainsaws in a circle around you, traveling back to you upon landing.

Subskills.name: Ruthless Chainsaws
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to bleeding targets.

Subskills.name: Consumed Rupture
Subskills.description: When hitting a bleeding monster, consume the bleeding debuff and unleash an explosion of blood scaling with the bleeding damage.

Subskills.name: Full Gas Tank
Subskills.description: Increases the duration of rogue chainsaws.

Subskills.name: Shredding Squad
Subskills.description: Launch multiple rogue chainsaws in an arc instead of throwing them on the ground.

Subskills.name: Homing Chainsaws
Subskills.description: Rogue chainsaws now home towards the closest monster.
